attributes.action: Alter the benefits system, to require the claimant to prove this situation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to request that should suspicion be placed on a claimant, they are the ones the onus is on to prove otherwise, e.g. single mother has 3 kids all with the same father, they must show bill to indicate fathers residence is other than that stated for the mother. Should suspicion be placed for incapacity benefits then a government approved doctor must perform the examination to ensure eligabilty
